      • calculateGoalsGap

        public java.lang.Integer calculateGoalsGap()
        the method calculate the gap between overall goals scored by this team minus overall goals against this team

        If the gap is negative it means that the team has received goals more than scored

        Returns:
        the gap between the goals of this team
